ygData.subject: Re: Lifetap anything for SK
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I am a necro, my wife is a SK. I have never even use vampiric embrace, as most other necros dont either..we dont have the slots. One reason it may be
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I am a necro, my wife is a SK. I have never even use vampiric embrace,
as most other necros dont either..we dont have the slots. One reason it may
be doing more damage is do to skill level with the spell...
Not sure if it it true in this case or not, but please, SK, Make sure you
get those spell abilities up to speed... I see it time and time again,
although in mid twenties the ones that are still playing have figured it
out..
Keep your spell skills high, use archery and never underestimate the power
of a fear spell...
Morgul
----- Original Message -----
From: Bradley Shelton <bradley_shelton@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 1:41 PM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Lifetap anything for SK


> From: Bradley Shelton <bradley_shelton@...>
>
> Yes, I have to agree with Lief on that too. I would be fantastic to have,
> but I doubt it will ever be implemented.
>
> What I think might be more feasible would be for Verant to increase the
> power of Vampiric Embrace so that it works exactly the same for both
Necros
> and Shadow Knights. As near as I can tell, when we get it at level 22,
it's
> effectiveness is already weaker then a Necromancer of around level 8. I've
> heard of many Necro's stating that it taps for 30+ a whack for them in the
> late teens, increasing by a point or so around every level. However, it
> seems that when we get the spell it is much weaker then a level 8 Necro's
VE
> - which is why it taps for just six points or so at the start for us
(which
> is in reality pretty useless). My Necro friend just confirmed that when
> Necro's get this spell around level 8, they tap for around 20 a whack. Why
> is it that when we get it, it starts at six?
>
> Now I'm only a paltry level 13, so I can't confirm the Vampiric Embrace
> performance for Shadow Knights myself. But, from what I have been able to
> gather from message boards, this spell is definitely performing
differently
> for us.
>
> My only other suggestion would be for Voice Graft to be replaced with
Hungry
> Earth, a Necromancer spell of comparison level that would fit into our DOT
> theme as well providing a much needed Root type of spell.
>
> Just my two cents.
>
> Zulk, Veeshan Troll SDK, 13th power
>
>
